tool.name: Quality Checks
tool.description: Extract run information from tools used in pipeline.

param.name: input_fastq
param.label: PEARed Fastq
param.help: Data collection of PEARed fastq files, for count spikes QC.

param.name: spike_counts
param.label: Spike Counts
param.help: Data collection of 25-bp spike count files, for count spikes QC.

param.name: despiked
param.label: Despiked Fastq
param.help: Data collection of PEARed fastq files, with spiked reads identified by 9-bp count spikes removed. For count spikes QC.

param.name: align_reports
param.label: Align Report
param.help: Data collection of report files generated by MiXCR Align.

param.name: assemble_reports
param.label: Assemble Report
param.help: Data collection of report files generated by MiXCR Assemble.

param.name: decontam_qc
param.label: Decontamination QC
param.help: Individual QC files generated during decontamination.

param.name: decontam_clones
param.label: Raw Clonotype Counts
param.help: Data collection of clonotype count files generated by exportClones. And also decontaminated. For normalization QC.

param.name: norm_clones
param.label: Normalized Clonotype Counts
param.help: Data collection of normalized clonotype count files. Generated by exportClones, with counts normalized using scaling factor.

tool.help: This tool calculates various QC metrics for count/remove spikes, mixcr align, mixcr assemble, and normalization. Figure out how to format help better and make this more specific.
